abstract: NFL Roundup; San Diego Chargers opt to stay in San Diego, Calif, for 2016 season, giving franchise more time to negotiate potential new stadium deal with St Louis Rams in Inglewood, Calif; other pro football news noted.

headline.print_headline: Chargers Will Play at Least One More Season in San Diego
headline.main: Chargers Will Play at Least One More Season in San Diego

snippet: The team will continue to negotiate with local officials on a new facility to replace aging Qualcomm Stadium, but the door remained open for a move to Los Angeles to share a stadium with the Rams.
lead_paragraph: The team will continue to negotiate with local officials on a new facility to replace aging Qualcomm Stadium, but the door remained open for a move to Los Angeles to share a stadium with the Rams.
